mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_REPLY( USER_ID, CONTENT, COMM_NUM, DATE, FAQ_NUM, RW_NUM, lecturenum, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( #{userId}, #{content}, #{commNum}, SYSDATE(), #{faqNum}, #{rwNum}, #{lecturenum}, SYSDATE(), #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NUM AS replyNum, USER_ID AS userId, COMM_NUM AS commNum, RW_NUM AS rwNum, FAQ_NUM AS faqNum, CONTENT, DATE, lecturenum FROM T_BEDU_REPLY WHERE FAQ_NUM = #{faqNum} ORDER BY REPLY_NUM DESC
